text: @Mahdresher1 @WardenKristina @maddow Actually there have been numerous cases of healthy young individuals with no comorbidities contracting the virus and dying. It is a misconception that only the old and sick are affected. Also: Italy didn’t take it very seriously in the beginning and look where they are now
